record.metatitle: What is PMP (Project Management Professional)?
record.metadescription: Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is an industry recognized credential for project managers.

record.metatitle: Eligibility criteria and structure of PMP exam
record.metadescription: In order to be eligible for PMP Certification you need to have project management experience amd know about the structure of PMP Exam

record.metatitle: How to apply for PMP Certification Exam?
record.metadescription: PMP application form is available in both online and printable PDF mode in PMI website (www.pmi.org).

record.metatitle: How to prepare for the PMP Exam?
record.metadescription: Know the strategy about how to prepare for the PMP Exam and crack it in one shot

record.metatitle: What sort of questions I can expect to see in PMP Exam
record.metadescription: The type of questions expected can be known. The questions will test all your knowledge related to project management concepts.

record.metatitle: How to stay relaxed on the day of PMP Exam?
record.metadescription: Here are some tips on how to stay relaxed on the day of exam.

record.metatitle: How to maintain PMP Certification?
record.metadescription: After receiving your certification, you must maintain it by attending CCR Programs.

record.metatitle: Benefits of PMP Certification
record.metadescription: know the benefits of PMP Certification and the views expressed by PMP credential holders.

record.metatitle: Cost structure of PMP exam
record.metadescription: The cost structure for PMP exam varies based on the PMI membership status. The fee structure of PMP Certification exam is given in detail.

record.metatitle: Career opportunities for PMP Certified Credentials?
record.metadescription: The salary range for project managers across the world ranges from $160,409 - $91,109. Companies like IBM, Microsoft are hiring PMP Certified candidates.

record.metatitle: What is CAPM?
record.metadescription: Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM)Â® affirmation furnishes you with globally perceived undertaking administration certification PMP.

record.metatitle: Advantages of CAPM Certification
record.metadescription: There are multiple benefits by gaining CAPM Certification. Gain the certification and make your career in Project Management.

record.metatitle: What is the Eligibility Requirement to take up CAPM Certification
record.metadescription: To be eligible for the PMP credential, you need to meet certain educational and professional experience requirements.

record.metatitle: Cost structure of CAPM exam
record.metadescription: The cost structure for PMP exam varies based on the PMI membership status. There are two modes of examination test type and price varies accordingly.

record.metatitle: Application Process for CAPM
record.metadescription: Once you are confident that you are eligible for certification fill the application form available in www.pmi.org site and take up the exam

record.metatitle: Tips to prepare for CAPM Exam?

record.metatitle: What is the Exam Format for CAPM?
record.metadescription: The CAPM Exam Comprises of 150 multiple choice questions. Out of these 150 questions 15 are considered as pretest questions

record.metatitle: What is ITIL?
record.metadescription: Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) is the world's most widely used IT Service Management framework.

record.metatitle: Why does ITIL Certification matters? Benefits of ITIL certification
record.metadescription: The requirement for ITIL certified professionals is growing in many industries. ITIL best practices are very useful to manage the business effectively.

record.metatitle: What are the Various Levels of ITIL Certification?
record.metadescription: There are five levels of qualifications within the ITIL Qualification Scheme. By completing each level of certifications, you can gain credits and maintain your certification as well.

record.metatitle: Why ITIL Foundation Certification?
record.metadescription: The purpose of the ITIL Foundation certificate is to certify that you have gained knowledge on the ITIL terminology and structure.

record.metatitle: What is the Exam process and pattern of the ITIL Exam?
record.metadescription: The ITIL examination will be conducted by PEOPLECERT and APMG International accredited Companies. Exam contains multiple type questions containing 40 questions.

record.metatitle: Â Why adopt ITIL framework?
record.metadescription: Consistent and repeatable process are key terms to improve the services. These processes are covered in the ITIL Framework.

record.metatitle: Career Opportunities and Job Roles with ITIL Certification
record.metadescription: Thousands of companies and industries worldwide have adopted ITIL which include IBM, SONY, Toyota

record.metatitle: Define Six Sigma?
record.metadescription: Six Sigma is one of the most popular tools which is used in firms to eliminate the waste.

record.metatitle: Different Levels In Six Sigma?
record.metadescription: There are five different levels in Six Sigma. Professionals can create a promising future for themselves by gaining this certification.

record.metatitle: Who is right for Six Sigma Green Belt certification?
record.metadescription: This certification is right for the candidates who are interested in improving the process of business.

record.metatitle: Roles and Responsibilities of Six Sigma Green Belt Professionals
record.metadescription: Green Belts should have a clear idea of the overall process as they work with centralized project managers on delivering projects.

record.metatitle: Carrer opportunities for SSGB Professionlas
record.metadescription: Six Sigma Certification on your resume proves your analytical skills. Also, the highest salary range is $113.

record.metatitle: What is Six Sigma?
record.metadescription: Six Sigma is a strategy or a practice for eliminating defectsÂ in a project and there by providing methods to eliminate the defects.

record.metatitle: What are the Levels (Belts) available in Six Sigma?
record.metadescription: There are five different levels in Six Sigma which includes white belt, black belt, master black belt etc.

record.metatitle: Explain the significance of Six Sigma Black Belt and its benefits
record.metadescription: The role of black belt varies from other belts. They should be able to manage the whole project team.

record.metatitle: Who is right for Six Sigma Black Belt certification?
record.metadescription: Professionals who are passionate about the quality management can take up this Certifciation. Pre Requisities of the certiication can also be known.

record.metatitle: What is the role of Six Sigma Black Belt Professionals in projects?
record.metadescription: The expectation of black belt varies from other belts. They should be able to manage the whole project team and the quality of the project.

record.metatitle: Career opportunities for Six Sigma Black Belt Certified Professionals
record.metadescription: SSBB Professionals have profitable career path ranging from Business Analysts to Process Improvement experts in the organizations.

record.metatitle: What is Big Data?
record.metadescription: Big Data is an all-inclusive term which refers to the voluminous amount of structured and unstructured data that is difficult to process using traditional database.

record.metatitle: Why Big Data Certification matters?
record.metadescription: Today, Organisations are hiring Big Data professionals to improve efficiency of the project Percentage with Big Data Initiatives is 70% in India.

record.metatitle: What is Hadoop?
record.metadescription: Hadoop is 100% open source Javaâbased programming framework that supports the processing of large data sets in a distributed computing environment.

record.metatitle: What are the Use Cases of Big Data
record.metadescription: The use cases of Big Data includes, Big Data Exploration, Operational Analysis, Security intelligence criteria etc

record.metatitle: Applications of Big Data
record.metadescription: Big Data has Various Applications in Retail/consumer Service, Web and Digital media, telecommunications.

record.metatitle: Career Opportunities and Job Roles available for Big Data certified professionals
record.metadescription: Job Roles available for Big Data certified Professionals are Hadoop Administrator, Big Data Manager.

record.metatitle: About Big Data Developer Certification
record.metadescription: Big Data Developer is the one who loves programming. He/she needs to have a knowledge of core Java, SQL and any scripting language along with good interpersonal skills.

record.metatitle: Employment Opportunities with Big Data Certification
record.metadescription: Today,Â the job market is very lucrative for people with Hadoop skills. There are huge benefits of becoming a Big Data developer as there will ba huge increase in salary

record.metatitle: What is PRINCE2 foundation certificate?
record.metadescription: PRojects In a Controlled environment (PRINCE2) is a methodology used in Project Management to improve Project management skills. It also helps in gaining an effective output.

record.metatitle: PRINCE2 Certification levels
record.metadescription: PRINCE2 Qualification constitutes different levels of Certification which includes PRiNCE2 Foundation, Practitioner, Professional and Agile.

record.metatitle: Benefits of being PRINCE2 Foundation Certified Professional
record.metadescription: Gaining the PRINCE2 Foundation Certification is very important for upcoming Project managers. This Certification increases the opportunities to work in project team.

record.metatitle: Exam Structure of PRINCE2 Foundation certification
record.metadescription: The PRINCE2 Foundation exam will have objective type testing questions and it is conducted by PEOPLE CERT.

record.metatitle: Top Tips to clear PRINCE2 Foundation Exam
record.metadescription: It is not that easy to clear the PRINCE2 Foundation exam in first attempt. Follow few tips which will make your exam day simpler.

record.metatitle: What is the Maximum salary for PRINCE2 Certified Professional?

record.metatitle: Different Levels in PRINCE2?
record.metadescription: PRINCE2 constitutes different levels of Certification which includes PRiNCE2 Foundation, Practitioner, Professional and Agile.

record.metatitle: Why PRINCE2 Practitioner Certification?
record.metadescription: Gaining PRINCE2 Practitioner Certification will be extremely beneficial for your career in the stream of Project Management.

record.metatitle: Qualification requirement /criteria for PRINCE2 Practitioner Exam
record.metadescription: In order to be eligible for PRINCE2 Practitioner Certification Exam Candidate should be PRINCE2 Foundation Certified.

record.metadescription: The PRINCE2 Practitioner exam will have objective type questions. Conducted by PEOPLE CERT and the duration is for two and half hours.

record.metadescription: It is not that easy to clear the PRINCE2 Practitioner exam in first shot. Follow few tips which will make your exam day simpler.

record.metadescription: Companies like IBM,Microsoft, TCS, Wipro are hiring PRINCE2 Foundation Certified candidates. The Average Salary of a general Practitioner is Rs.518,512 per year.

record.metatitle: What is PMI-ACP Certificate?
record.metadescription: ACP is an acronym of Agile Certified Practitioner. This certification is provided by Project Management Institute PMI and hence it is PMI-ACP

record.metatitle: Advantages of gaining ACP Certification
record.metadescription: Gaining a PMI Agile Certified Practitioner (ACP) Certification is a value added asset to your career in the field of Agile Project Management.

record.metatitle: What are the Eligibility Requirement for PMI-ACP Certification Exam?
record.metadescription: In order to be eligible for the PMI-ACP Certification you need to meet certain professional requirements

record.metadescription: The ACP Exam comprises of 120 multiple choice questions. Out of these 120 questions 20 are considered as pretest questions
